name: Crypto Dual-Volume VWAP Breakout Intraday
description: Intraday trend-following breakout strategy for liquid cryptocurrencies on a 5-minute chart. Uses the Dual-Volume VWAP Breakout signal, enters long when price closes above the upper VWAP band with a >30 % volume surge, and exits on opposite VWAP/volume conditions. Risk capped to 2 % of equity per trade with a 1.5 % fixed stop and 3 % trailing style take-profit.
